alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 9:45AM CDT until March 30 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River At Jackson affecting Rankin and Hinds Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River At Jackson. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Minor flooding of lowland near the river is occurring. Water begins to back up into several creeks and streams in the Jackson area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Friday the stage was 27.8 feet. - Forecast...The river gage at Highway 80 is expected to rise above flood stage Friday morning and continue rising to 28.5 feet Friday evening. The river gage at Lakeland Drive will reach 32.5 feet, which is an elevation of 266.0 feet, later today. - Flood stage at highway 80 is 28.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Pearl River Jackson 28.0 27.8 Fri 9 am CDT 28.5 28.4 28.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CDT.
